original_text: But she was greatly troubled at the saying, and tried to discern what sort of greeting this might be.
korean_text: 처녀가 그 말을 듣고 놀라 이런 인사가 어찌함인가 생각하매

sentences.original_text: But she was greatly troubled at the saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀는 그 말씀에 심히 놀라며

sentences.original_text: and tried to discern what sort of greeting this might be.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 인사가 어떤 것인지 헤아리려 하였다
